Title: 12 Tapes for a Penny
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Stephen Basilone, Annie Mebane, Lacey Marisa Friedman (story editor)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Adam schemes to get as many cassette tapes as possible from a mail-order music club, but when Beverly gets wind of this scam she points the blame at Erica. Meanwhile, Barry is determined to...
